description: Sent whenever a new user is created in SaaSquatch program where the classic program is enabled.
title: Classic User Created Webhook Schema

___^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,64}$.description: The referral code associated with the programId key
___^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,64}$.title: Referral Code

$eref.description: A map of programs to referral codes.
$eref.title: Referral Codes

___segments.description: Any segments this user belongs to
___segments.title: User Segments

$eref.description: Defines how custom fields can be specified on a user. Allows alphanumeric numbers and underscores.
$eref.title: User Custom Fields Schema

___customFields.description: Any custom fields set for this user
___customFields.title: Custom Fields

___dateBlocked.description: The date the referral was blocked
___dateBlocked.title: Date Blocked

___imageUrl.description: The URL to an image of this user
___imageUrl.title: Image Url

___cookieId.description: The anonymous cookie user identifier associated with this user if applicable (see anonymous users)
___cookieId.title: Anonymous Cookie User Id

___referredByCodes.description: Any codes used to refer this user
___referredByCodes.title: Referred By Codes

___^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,64}$.description: The share links available for this program
___^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,64}$.title: Program Share Link

___EMAIL.description: Share links tracked with the EMAIL engagement medium
___EMAIL.title: Email Share Links

___MOBILE.description: Share links tracked with the MOBILE engagement medium
___MOBILE.title: Mobile Share Links

___UNKNOWN.description: Share links tracked with the UNKNOWN engagement medium
___UNKNOWN.title: Share Links

$eref.description: Links this user can share to make referrals
$eref.title: Program Share Links

___DIRECT.description: Share link associated with the DIRECT share medium
___DIRECT.title: Direct Share Link

___dateCreated.description: A timestamp of the date this user was created
___dateCreated.title: Date Created

___lastSeenIP.description: The IP address of this user when they were most recently seen by SaaSquatch
___lastSeenIP.title: Last Seen IP

___firstSeenIP.description: The IP address of this user when they were first seen by SaaSquatch
___firstSeenIP.title: First Seen IP

___referable.description: True if this user can be referred in a program by other users
___referable.title: Referable
